author: zhoukevin
msg: javax.naming.CompositeName.hashCode()/toString()/equals()/compareTo()/startsWith()/endsWith() should throw NullPointerException when it contains NULL element. In addition, attach several tests for coverage and refine CompositeName and CompositeNameTest code.
